text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with a delicious spring asparagus
dish asparagus with ham garlic and lemon
it's really fast really simple to make
and here we go you're gonna take a saute
pan and put it on a medium-high heat
give it a little bit of olive oil and
then you're gonna fry some ham now you
can use anything you want I'm using
prosciutto you can use serrano ham
Smithfield ham any dry cure ham works
great you can even do this with bacon
pancetta which is regular old
supermarket ham if you if you have to
but pretty much works with anything so
I'll get a couple ounces of ham I just
tore it in shreds you can chop it and
I'm gonna cook that until it kind of
crisps up a little bit and that's gonna
flavor that oil with that delicious ham
enos alright so after three or four
minutes I'm gonna add my trimmed
asparagus so I have one bunch and I'm
gonna put it in all the same direction
so it kind of sits in there nicely just
makes it easier to turn I'm gonna take
my tongs and I'm gonna coat it with that
beautiful flavored olive oil and once
all these spears are pretty much coated
with that oil I'm gonna add a quarter
cup of water I'm gonna throw a lid on
really fast and what's gonna happen that
little amount of water is really gonna
create a lot of steam so after one
minute take off the lid throw in your
garlic alright give it a nice toss and
then the lid goes back on for one more
minute so after one more minute we're
gonna take the lid off now how you know
this is done the spears are gonna go
from stiff to semi stiff all right so
keep tossing them and remember once in a
while you're gonna grab the bottom of a
stock and just give it a little waggle
to that
that's done okay still nice and green
crisp tender is the official term this
is only gonna take a couple minutes
altogether you see since we had the
cover off for that last minute the
liquid isn't pretty much evaporated
we're gonna pile it up on a nice plate
so once that's piled up you're gonna
spread that ham and garlic over the top
if you could smell this
you'd be like mmm that smells good and
then to finish take a lemon cut it in
half and squeeze it over
on believable now if you really want to
you know get in touch with your inner
Italian you could grate some parmesan
over this it didn't even need it and
then I just ate these with my fingers
which is the most delicious way there it
is very simple kind of a rustic Italian
asparagus recipe asparagus with ham
garlic and lemon come on the
supermarkets are filled with asparagus
and I know you're out of ways to cook it
so here's a new one give it a try go to
the site all the ingredients are there
and as always enjoy
